scripts.capacitor:add:ios: npm run build && npx cap add ios
scripts.capacitor:add:android: npm run build && npx cap add android
scripts.capacitor:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.app:build:ios: npm run build && npx cap sync && npx cap open ios
scripts.app:build:android: npm run build && npx cap sync && npx cap open android
